title: With a field trip ending in tragedy, just how safe are school buses in SC? We took a look.
info:
Post and Courier
Data Analysis & Visualization | QGIS
brief: After a fatal school bus crash in the Upstate, my colleague and I analyzed crash data to assess how safe these specially designed vehicles really are — and to inform the public of the risks children face on their daily rides.

title: King Street nights
info:
Post and Courier
Data Analysis & Visualization | Interactive | Adobe Illustrator | Adobe Animate
brief: I designed this multimedia story documenting Charleston's nightlife in collaboration with reporters and a photographer. I built the project from scratch using fully customized CSS and HTML. The story features a scroll-and-play data visualization created with Adobe Animate, along with a custom CSS photo gallery that can be reused in future projects.
